mapper.insert: INSERT INTO carQna(qnaNum, secret, question, memberIdx, carNum, question_date) VALUES(qnaNum_seq.NEXTVAL, #{secret}, #{question}, #{memberIdx}, #{carNum}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO carQnaFile(fileNum, qnaNum, filename) VALUES(carQnaFile_seq.NEXTVAL, qnaNum_seq.CURRVAL, #{filename})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM carQna WHERE carNum = #{carNum} AND enabled = 1

SELECT q.qnaNum, q.memberIdx, m.userName, q.secret, q.question, q.answer, q.carNum, q.enabled, q.question_date, q.answer_date ,c.carName, f.filename , m2.userId answerId FROM carQna q JOIN campingCar c ON q.carNum = c.carNum JOIN member1 m ON q.memberIdx = m.memberIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT qnaNum, LISTAGG(filename, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY fileNum) filename FROM carQnaFile GROUP BY qnaNum ) f ON q.qnaNum=f.qnaNum LEFT OUTER JOIN member1 m2 ON q.answerId = m2.userId WHERE q.carNum = #{carNum} ORDER BY q.qnaNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
